titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, adjust the number of cadets to be nominated to the United States Military Academy, United States Naval Academy, and United States Airforce Academy and for other purposes.

To amend title 10, United States Code, adjust the number of cadets to be nominated to the United States Military Academy, United States Naval Academy, and United States Airforce Academy and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Guam Service Academy Equality Act
This bill increases from four to five the number of cadets the Delegate in Congress from Guam is authorized to nominate to the U.S. Military Academy, U.S. Naval Academy, and the U.S. Air Force Academy.
